remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 而不是使用，我们建议您创建通过使用实例类和方法。Instead of using the , we recommend that you create instances by using the class and the method. 这使你充分利用的一致性检查以及与 XML 1.0 建议的一致性。This enables you to take advantage of conformance checking and compliance to the XML 1.0 recommendation. `XmlNodeReader`具有读取 XML DOM 子树的能力。The `XmlNodeReader` has the ability to read an XML DOM subtree. 此类不支持文档类型定义 (DTD) 或架构验证。This class does not support document type definition (DTD) or schema validation. 但是，可以创建对象来包装要验证中存储的数据对象对象，如示例部分中所示。However, you can create an object that wraps around the object to validate the data stored in the object, as shown in Examples section. ## Examples 在以下示例中，XML 文件加载到 XML 文档中并进行修改。In the following example, an XML file is loaded into an XML document and modified. XML 文档传递给 ，后者再传递给 方法。The XML document is passed to an , which is then passed to the method. 在验证读取器分析文件时，可以验证对 XML 文件所作的任何更改。When the validating reader parses the file, it can validate any changes made to the XML file. [!code-csharp[XmlReader_Validate_DOM#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_DOM/CS/valid_dom.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlReader_Validate_DOM#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader_Validate_DOM/VB/valid_dom.vb#1)] ## 输入Input 下列文件作为输入使用。The following files are used as input. #### bookSchema.xmlbookSchema.xml [!code-xml[XML_Core_Files#8](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XML_Core_Files/XML/booksschema.xml#8)] #### books.xsdbooks.xsd [!code-xml[XML_Core_Files#9](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XML_Core_Files/XML/books.xsd#9)] ## 输出Output 验证错误：未声明“publisher”属性。Validation Error: The 'publisher' attribute is not declared.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 中，建议的做法是使用 类和 方法创建 实例。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the recommended practice is to create instances using the class and the method. 这样可以充分利用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中引入的所有新功能。This allows you to take full advantage of all the new features introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注部分中的参考页。For more information, see the Remarks section in the reference page. 联网的 XML 文档的聚合使用各种 W3C 标准包含机制的数据块组成，因此包含来自不同位置的节点。A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data aggregated using various W3C standard inclusion mechanisms and therefore contains nodes that come from different places. DTD 实体就是一个例子，但这并不局限于 Dtd。DTD entities are an example of this, but this is not limited to DTDs. 基 URI 将指示您从这些节点的源位置。The base URI tells you where these nodes came from. 如果没有要返回的节点没有基 URI （例如，它们已从分析的内存中字符串），则返回 String.Empty。If there is no base URI for the nodes being returned (for example, they were parsed from an in-memory string), String.Empty is returned. ## Examples 下面的示例分析文件并显示每个节点的基 URI。The following example parses a file and displays the base URI of each of the nodes. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 中，建议的做法是使用 类和 方法创建 实例。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the recommended practice is to create instances using the class and the method. 这样可以充分利用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中引入的所有新功能。This allows you to take full advantage of all the new features introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注部分中的参考页。For more information, see the Remarks section in the reference page. 下表列出具有要返回的值的节点类型。The following table lists node types that have a value to return. |节点类型Node Type|“值”Value| |---------------|-----------| |`Attribute`|属性的值。The value of the attribute.| |`CDATA`|CDATA 节的内容。The content of the CDATA section.| |`Comment`|注释的内容。The content of the comment.| |`DocumentType`|内部子集。The internal subset.| |`ProcessingInstruction`|全部内容（不包括指令目标）。The entire content, excluding the target.| |`SignificantWhitespace`|混合内容模型中标记之间的空白。The white space between markup in a mixed content model.| |`Text`|文本节点的内容。The content of the text node.| |`Whitespace`|标记之间的空白。The white space between markup.| |`XmlDeclaration`|声明的内容。The content of the declaration.| ## Examples 下面的示例显示的值可以是每个节点的值。The following example displays the value for every node which can have a value. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 中，建议的做法是使用 类和 方法创建 实例。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the recommended practice is to create instances using the class and the method. 这样可以充分利用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中引入的所有新功能。This allows you to take full advantage of all the new features introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注部分中的参考页。For more information, see the Remarks section in the reference page. 此方法的内容流式处理、 对 Base64 内容解码并返回解码后的二进制字节 （例如，内联 Base64 编码 GIF 图像） 到缓冲区。This method streams the content, decodes the Base64 content, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline Base64 encoded GIF image) into the buffer. 可以连续调用此方法，以读取大的嵌入文本流。This method can be called successively to read large streams of embedded text. 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 1521"MIME （多用途 Internet 邮件扩展） 部分一个： 用于指定和 Internet 消息正文的格式描述机制"。For more information, see RFC 1521, "MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) Part One: Mechanisms for Specifying and Describing the Format of Internet Message Bodies". 您可以获得从 Rfc[征求意见文档网站](https://www.rfc-editor.org)。You can obtain RFCs from the [Request for Comments Web site](https://www.rfc-editor.org). > [!NOTE] > 不应访问的任何读取器属性调用之间方法，直到该方法返回值 0。You should not access any of the reader properties between calls to the method until the method returns the value 0. 此方法具有以下行为：This method has the following behavior: - 它已达到处理字节流的末尾时返回的值为 0。 returns the value 0 when it has reached the end of the byte stream it was operating on. 读取器位于第一个非内容节点上。The reader is positioned on the first non-content node. - 如果您要求更少，或在其当前位置中保留的字节数比在流中读取器保留的精确数目。If you ask for fewer, or the exact number, of bytes than are left in the stream the reader remains in its current position. - 在以下 XML 节点类型上不支持： 元素、 XmlDeclaration，无、 文档，文档类型、 表示法、 实体、 DocumentFragment。 is not supported on the following XML node types: Element, XmlDeclaration, None, Document, DocumentType, Notation, Entity, DocumentFragment.

to create instances using the class and the method. 这样可以充分利用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中引入的所有新功能。This allows you to take full advantage of all the new features introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注部分中的参考页。For more information, see the Remarks section in the reference page. 此方法读取内容，并使用 Base64 编码、 解码并返回已解码的二进制字节 （例如，内联 Base64 编码 GIF 图像） 到缓冲区。This method reads the content, decodes it using Base64 encoding, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline Base64 encoded GIF image) into the buffer. 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 1521"MIME （多用途 Internet 邮件扩展） 部分一个： 用于指定和 Internet 消息正文的格式描述机制"。For more information, see RFC 1521, "MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) Part One: Mechanisms for Specifying and Describing the Format of Internet Message Bodies". 您可以获得从 Rfc[征求意见文档网站](https://www.rfc-editor.org)。You can obtain RFCs from the [Request for Comments Web site](https://www.rfc-editor.org). 此方法只能读取简单内容元素。This method can only read simple-content elements. 元素可以包含文本、 空白、 有效空白、 CDATA 节、 注释和处理指令。The element can contain text, white space, significant white space, CDATA sections, comments and processing instructions. 它还可以包含实体引用，会自动扩展。It can also contain entity references, which are automatically expanded. 元素不能具有子元素。The element cannot have child elements. 此方法是非常类似于方法，但它只能在元素节点类型上调用。This method is very similar to the method except that it can only be called on element node types. 如果计数值高于在文档中的字节数，或是否在文档中的字节数相等读取该文档中的所有剩余字节，并返回读取的字节数。If the count value is higher than the number of bytes in the document, or if it is equal to the number of bytes in the document, the reads all the remaining bytes in the document and returns the number of bytes read. 下一步方法调用会返回 0 并将读取器移动到节点以下节点。The next remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)] 中，建议的做法是使用 类和 方法创建 实例。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the recommended practice is to create instances using the class and the method. 这样可以充分利用 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 中引入的所有新功能。This allows you to take full advantage of all the new features introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. 有关详细信息，请参阅备注部分中的参考页。For more information, see the Remarks section in the reference page. 如果定位在元素上，`ReadString`一起连接所有文本、 有效空白、 空白和 CData 部分节点类型，并返回串联的数据作为元素内容。If positioned on an element, `ReadString` concatenates all text, significant white space, white space, and CData section node types together and returns the concatenated data as the element content. 它将停止时遇到任何标记。It stops when any markup is encountered. 这可以在混合内容模型中发生，也可以在读取元素结束标记时发生。This could occur in a mixed content model, or when an element end tag is read. 如果定位在类似于文本的节点上`ReadString`执行相同的串联文本节点从到元素结束标记。If positioned on a text-like node, `ReadString` performs the same concatenation from the text node to the element end tag. 如果读取器定位在属性文本节点上，则 `ReadString` 与读取器定位在元素开始标记上时的功能相同。If the reader is positioned on an attribute text node, `ReadString` has the same functionality as if the reader were position on the element start tag. 它返回所有串联在一起的元素文本节点。It returns all the concatenated element text nodes. ## Examples 以下示例显示每个元素的文本的内容。The following example displays the text content of each of the elements.
